pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Data with Mixed Measurement Error and Misclassification in Covariates // Implementation of the augmented Simulation-Extrapolation (SIMEX) algorithm proposed by Yi et al. (2015) doi:10.1080/01621459.2014.922777 for analyzing the data with mixed measurement error and misclassification. The main function provides a similar summary output as that of glm() function. Both parametric and empirical SIMEX are considered in the package.
